question: Yankees vs. Guardians - Game 3
description:
This market refers to Game 3 of the 2024 American League Championship Series in the MLB Playoffs between the Cleveland Guardians and the New York Yankees and the Cleveland Guardians scheduled for October 17, 2024, 5:08 PM ET.

If the Cleveland Guardians win, the market will resolve to “Guardians”.

If the New York Yankees win, the market will resolve to “Yankees”.

If the game is cancelled or postponed past 11:59 PM ET on October 18, 2024, this market will resolve to 50-50.

The primary resolution source for this market will be official information from Major League Baseball (MLB.com), however, a consensus of credible reporting may also be used.

events.title: ALCS: Guardians vs. Yankees Game 3
events.description: This is a market on the outcome of Game 3 of the American League Championship Series between the Guardians and the Yankees.

question: Mets vs. Dodgers - Game 4
description:
This market refers to Game 4 of the 2024 National League Championship Series in the MLB Playoffs between the New York Mets and the Los Angeles Dodgers scheduled for October 17, 2024, 8:08 PM ET.

If the New York Mets win this market will resolve to "Mets".

If the Los Angeles Dodgers win, the market will resolve to “Dodgers”.

If the game is cancelled or postponed past 11:59 PM ET on October 18, 2024, this market will resolve to 50-50.

The primary resolution source for this market will be official information from Major League Baseball (MLB.com), however, a consensus of credible reporting may also be used.

events.title: NLCS: Mets vs. Dodgers Game 4
events.description: This is a market on the outcome of Game 4 between the Mets and Dodgers in the National Championship League Series.

question: Will the Mets and Dodgers combine for 8 or more runs scored?
description:
This market refers to Game 4 of the 2024 National League Championship Series in the MLB Playoffs between the New York Mets and the Los Angeles Dodgers scheduled for October 17, 2024, 8:08 PM ET.

If the combined total runs scored by the the New York Mets and the Los Angeles Dodgers in their game is 8 or more, this market will resolve to “Over”. If it is less than 8, this market will resolve to “Under”.

If the game is cancelled or postponed past 11:59 PM ET on October 18, 2024, this market will resolve to 50-50.

The primary resolution source for this market will be official information from Major League Baseball (MLB.com), however, a consensus of credible reporting may also be used.

events.title: NLCS: Mets vs. Dodgers Game 4
events.description: This is a market on the outcome of Game 4 between the Mets and Dodgers in the National Championship League Series.

question: Will there be at least 1 run scored in the first inning?
description:
This market refers to Game 4 of the 2024 National League Championship Series in the MLB Playoffs between the New York Mets and the Los Angeles Dodgers scheduled for October 17, 2024, 8:08 PM ET.

If there is a run scored by either team in the first inning of this game, this market will resolve to "Yes". Otherwise, this market will resolve to "No".

If the game is cancelled or postponed past 11:59 PM ET on October 18, 2024, this market will resolve to 50-50.

The primary resolution source for this market will be official information from Major League Baseball (MLB.com), however, a consensus of credible reporting may also be used.

question: Will Trump do better with men than in 2020 election?
description:
This market refers to the CNN release of the National Election Pool exit poll for the 2024 U.S. Presidential election conducted by Edison research. 

According to the CNN release of the National Election Pool exit poll for the 2020 US presidential election, Donald Trump received 53% of the male vote. You can see CNN's exit polls for the 2020 US presidential election here: https://www.cnn.com/election/2020/exit-polls/president/national-results

This market will resolve to “Yes” Donald Trump's share of male voters is 54% or greater in the 2024 US presidential election. Otherwise this market will resolve to “No”.

The resolution source for this market will be the CNN release of the Edison research exit poll. If CNN does not release the National Election Pool/Edison research exit poll by November 10, 2024, 12:00 PM ET, the polling numbers from the CBS release of the National Election Pool will be used. If CBS also has not released the poll, alternate releases of the of the National Election Pool will be used. If the National Election Pool/Edison research exit poll for the 2024 U.S. Presidential election is not conducted/released by November 20, 2024, 12:00 PM, or if the poll does not provide data on male voters this market will resolve to 50-50.

This market will resolve based on the full release of the Election Pool Exit Poll data from CNN. Initial or incomplete data will not be considered.

Note: Slight changes in terminology used by the poll will not affect resolution.

question: Who will win Latino men?
description:
This market refers to the CNN release of the National Election Pool exit poll for the 2024 U.S. Presidential election conducted by Edison research. 

This market will resolve to “Harris” if Kamala Harris wins a greater share of Latino men than Donald Trump in the 2024 US presidential election. 

This market will resolve to “Trump” if Donald Trump wins a greater share of Latino men than Kamala Harris in the 2024 US presidential election. 

This market will resolve to 50-50 if neither Donald Trump nor Kamala Harris win the plurality of Latino men in the 2024 US presidential election. 

The resolution source for this market will be the CNN release of the Edison research exit poll. If CNN does not release the National Election Pool/Edison research exit poll by November 10, 2024, 12:00 PM ET, the polling numbers from the CBS release of the National Election Pool will be used. If CBS also has not released the poll, alternate releases of the of the National Election Pool will be used. If the National Election Pool/Edison research exit poll for the 2024 U.S. Presidential election is not conducted/released by November 20, 2024, 12:00 PM, or if the poll does not provide data on Latino men voters this market will resolve to 50-50.

This market will resolve based on the full release of the Election Pool Exit Poll data from CNN. Initial or incomplete data will not be considered.

Note: Slight changes in terminology used by the poll will not affect resolution.

question: Will Russia recapture Sudzha before December?
description:
This market will resolve to “Yes” if, according to the ISW map, Russia captures the Sudzha railroad station located on Privokzal'naya ulitsa by November 30, 2024 at 11:59 PM ET.

The railroad station will be considered captured if any part of the train station icon is shaded red on the ISW map (https://storymaps.arcgis.com/stories/36a7f6a6f5a9448496de641cf64bd375) by the resolution date. If the area is not shaded red by November 30, 2024, 11:59 PM ET, the market will resolve to “No”.

Once Russia captures the railroad station, any subsequent loss of control will not be considered towards the resolution of this market.

Train Station Location: https://polymarket-upload.s3.us-east-2.amazonaws.com/Sudzha+train.jpeg

Sudzha Location: https://polymarket-upload.s3.us-east-2.amazonaws.com/Sudzha+location.jpeg

Location on Google maps: https://maps.app.goo.gl/s7MXZ3FSQBaVkAMk9

The primary resolution source for this market will be the ISW Ukraine map. If the ISW map is rendered unavailable, information from DeepStateMap (https://deepstatemap.live/) may be used. If information from both the ISW and DeepStateMap are rendered permanently unavailable, a consensus of credible reporting may be used.

Note: Any temporary glitches or errors in the map which will not be considered.

question: Will the Broncos beat the Saints by 3 or more points?
description:
This market refers to the NFL matchup between the Denver Broncos and the New Orleans Saints scheduled for October 17, 2024, at 8:15 PM ET.

This market will resolve to “Broncos” if the Denver Broncos win their game against the New Orleans Saints by 3 or more points.

Otherwise, this market will resolve to “Saints”.

If this game is postponed after October 23, 2024 (11:59 PM ET), or cancelled, this market will resolve 50-50.

The primary resolution source for this market will be official information from the NFL, however, a consensus of credible reporting will also be used.

events.title: NFL: Broncos vs. Saints
events.description: This is a market on the outcome of the NFL game between the Denver Broncos and the New Orleans Saints.

question: Will the Broncos and Saints combine for 38 or more points?
description:

If the combined total points scored by the the Denver Broncos and the New Orleans Saints in their game is 38 or more, this market will resolve to “Over”. If it is less than 38, this market will resolve to “Under”.

If this game is postponed after October 23, 2024 (11:59 PM ET), or cancelled, this market will resolve 50-50.

The primary resolution source for this market will be official information from the NFL, however, a consensus of credible reporting will also be used.

question: Will Alvin Kamara score a Touchdown?
description:
This market refers to the NFL matchup between the Denver Broncos and the New Orleans Saints scheduled for October 17, 2024, at 8:15 PM ET.

This market will resolve to “Yes” if Alvin Kamara of the New Orleans Saints records 1 or more touchdown in his game against the Denver Broncos. Otherwise this market will resolve to “No”.

All rushing, receiving, and passing touchdown count. Special teams or defensive touchdowns will not qualify.

If the game is not completed by October 24, 2024 (11:59 PM ET) the market will resolve to “No”.

events.title: NFL: Broncos vs. Saints
events.description: This is a market on the outcome of the NFL game between the Denver Broncos and the New Orleans Saints.

question: Will Trump say "weave" during Pennsylvania rally on October 19?
description:
Donald Trump has scheduled a rally on October 19 in Latrobe, Pennsylvania (see: https://event.donaldjtrump.com/events/president-donald-j-trump-to-hold-a-rally-in-latrobe-pennsylvania).

This market will resolve to "Yes" if Trump says "weave" during their appearance at this event. Otherwise, the market will resolve to "No".

Any usage of the term regardless of context will count toward the resolution of this market.

Pluralization/possessive of the term will count toward the resolution of this market, however other forms will NOT count.

Compound words will count as long as "weave" is part of the compound word and references the meaning which refers to Donald Trump's manner of speech.

If this candidate does not appear at this event, or if the event is otherwise cancelled or delayed beyond October 19, this market will resolve to "No".

The resolution source will be the video of the event.

question: Will Kamala do another Fox News interview before election?
description:
This market will resolve to "Yes" if Kamala Harris is interviewed on Fox News between October 17, 3:00 PM, and November 4, 2024, 11:59 PM ET. Otherwise, this market will resolve to "No".

For the purposes of this market, an interview is defined as a scheduled, recorded conversation where Kamala Harris answers questions posed by a member of Fox News. Press conferences or media briefings held by the Kamala Harris will not count as interviews for the purposes of this market.

The interview must be conducted and publicly released within the market's time frame in order to qualify. 

The resolution source for this market will be a consensus of credible reporting.

question: Scorigami in NFL Week 7?
description:
In sports, a Scorigami is a scoring combination that has never before occurred in a sport or league's history.

This market will resolve to "Yes" if at least one NFL Scorigami occurs during Week 7 of the 2024-25 NFL Season. Otherwise, this market will resolve to "No".

This market may only resolve to "No" once all scheduled games for Week 7 have been completed and none resulted in a new Scorigami.

The primary resolution source for this market is official information from the NFL ([https://www.nfl.com/scores/](https://www.nfl.com/scores/)), however other sites tracking Scorigami may be used ([nflscorigami.com](https://nflscorigami.com/), [twitter.com/NFL_Scorigami](https://twitter.com/NFL_Scorigami)).

question: Will Virginia Tech beat Boston College?
description:
In the upcoming NCAA Football game, scheduled for October 17, 2024, at 7:30 PM ET:

If the Virginia Tech Hokies win, the market will resolve to “VT”

If the Boston College Eagles win, the market will resolve to “BC”

If the game is not completed by October 24, 2024 (11:59 PM ET), or it ends in a tie, the market will resolve 50-50.

The primary resolution source for this market will be official information from the NCAA, however, a consensus of credible reporting will also be used.

events.title: CFB: Virginia Tech vs. Boston College
events.description: This is a market on the outcome of the college football game between Virginia Tech and Boston College.

question: Will Virginia Tech beat Boston College by 8 or more points?
description:
This market refers to the NCAAF matchup between the Virginia Tech Hokies and the Boston College Eagles scheduled for October 17, 2024, at 7:30 PM ET.

This market will resolve to “Yes” if the Virginia Tech Hokies win their game against the Boston College Eagles by 8 or more points.

Otherwise, this market will resolve to “No.”

If this game is postponed after October 24, 2024 (11:59 PM ET), or cancelled, this market will resolve 50-50.

The primary resolution source for this market will be official information from the NCAA, however, a consensus of credible reporting will also be used.

events.title: CFB: Virginia Tech vs. Boston College

question: Will there be 49 or more combined points scored?
description:
This market refers to the NCAAF matchup between the Virginia Tech Hokies and the Boston College Eagles scheduled for October 17, 2024, at 7:30 PM ET.

If the combined total points scored by the Virginia Tech Hokies and the Boston College Eagles in their game on October 17, 2024, is 49 or more, this market will resolve to “Over” If it is less than 49, this market will resolve to “Under”

If this game is postponed after October 24, 2024 (11:59 PM ET), or cancelled, this market will resolve 50-50.

The primary resolution source for this market will be official information from the NCAA, however, a consensus of credible reporting will also be used.
